attributes.action: restrict users of the Heathrow tunnel to approved vehicles only.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Terrorists could easily drive 4 vehicles into the Heathrow tunnel in order to coincide a devastating attack. 2 vehicles could be inbound and 2 outbound at the same time. Not only would this close the Terminals but also destroy the runway above.
